channel.title: Fixing Barrows
channel.description:
I already got the public void fixBarrows(){ but how can i make it works when i talk with a npc.
When you talk with that npc and you have the barrow piece + X alz he will take the alz and piece and replace it with the new barrow piece.

item.title: Fixing Barrows
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

I already got the public void fixBarrows(){ but how can i make it works when i talk with a npc.

When you talk with that npc and you have the barrow piece + X alz he will take the alz and piece and replace it with the new barrow piece.
